Package com.pi4j.io.gpio

Interface GpioPinDigital

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GpioPin
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GpioPinDigitalInput, GpioPinDigitalMultipurpose, GpioPinDigitalOutput
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GpioPinImpl
    public interface GpioPinDigital
extends GpioPin
    Gpio digital pin interface. This interface is extension of GpioPin interface with operation to read digital states.
    Author:
    Robert Savage (http://www.savagehomeautomation.com)
